title: New Nurses' Learning Competency Enhancement Project in Organizational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic clinical practice knowledge and organizational work experience
context.additional_context: Restructuring new nurses' learning experiences in a hospital organizational setting through project-based team activities, including simulation tasks resembling real medical cases.

learning_goals: Learners can establish task execution strategies that prioritize patient safety in resource-constrained organizational settings (limited personnel/time)
Learners can collaborate with peer nurses to analyze clinical cases and design processes for solving complex nursing problems
Learners can autonomously develop and implement learning plans that account for hospital organizational structures (shift rotations/patient volume fluctuations)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
